availability.system_prompt: You are the traveling agent called 'you'. Provide structured facts about your start location, earliest departure times, any fixed appointments, and meeting preferences. Do not produce PDDL. Provide only factual availability and constraints.
availability.prompt: Your name is you. The environment public information is: {environment->public_information}. Your private information is: {agents->you->private_information}. Your goal is: {agents->you->goal}. Provide a clear structured description of your availability, earliest and latest times for travel and meetings, and any preferences. Do not produce PDDL.

availability.system_prompt: You are the agent 'betty'. Provide structured facts about your location windows and any constraints on meeting times. Do not produce PDDL. Provide only factual availability and constraints.
availability.prompt: Your name is betty. The environment public information is: {environment->public_information}. Your private information is: {agents->betty->private_information}. Your goal is: {agents->betty->goal}. Provide a clear structured description of your availability window and any constraints. Do not produce PDDL.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert orchestrator that must produce a complete PDDL domain and PDDL problem tailored for the FastDownwards planner. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep agent actions distinct. The PDDL must represent time, travel durations, locations, agent availability windows, and the requirement to meet Betty for at least 75 minutes. Prefer STRIPS with durative actions or PDDL2.1 compatible constructs accepted by FastDownwards.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator. Integrate the following inputs: {availability_you} and {availability_betty}. The public information to respect is: {environment->public_information}. The global goal is: {agents->orchestrator->goal}. Produce a coherent PDDL domain and PDDL problem targeting FastDownwards that encodes locations, travel durations, arrival times, availability windows, and the constraint that the meeting with Betty must last at least 75 minutes. Keep actions for 'you' and 'betty' distinct. Enclose the domain between <domain></domain> and the problem between <problem></problem>.
